entry.lex: Abel Caballero was born in Galicia in Spain and was in office while Juan Carlos I of Spain was king. Juan Carlos I of Spain preceded Alfonso XIII of Spain.
Abel Caballero was born in Galicia in Spain and served in office during Juan Carlos I of Spain's reign. Juan Carlos's predeccessor was Alfonso XIII of Spain.
Abel Caballero of Ponteareas was in office during the reign of Juan Carlos I, who preceded Alfonso XIII in Spain.
Abel Caballero, who was born in Ponteareas, was in office whilst Juan Carlos I of Spain was Monarch whose predecessor was Alfonso XIII of Spain.
Abel Caballero, who was born in Ponteareas, was in office during the reign of Monarch, Juan Carlos I of Spain who succeeded Alfonso XIII of Spain.
Alfred N. Phillips who was born in Darien, Connecticut, was the Mayor of Stamford Connecticut and was succeded by Albert E. Austin.
Stamford Mayor Alfred N. Phillips, born in Darien, Connecticut, was succeeded by Albert E. Austin.
Alfred N Phillips was born in Darien, Connecticut and became Mayor of Stamford Connecticut before being succeeded by Albert E Austin.

originaltripleset.otriple: Alvah_Sabin | office | "Secretary of State of Vermont"

entry.lex: Alvah Sabin; was born in Georgia, Vermont, represented Vermont's 3rd Congressional District, and worked as the Secretary of State of Vermont.
Secretary of State of Vermont and a representative of Vermont's 3rd Congressional District, Alvah Sabin was born in Georgia, Vermont.
Alvah Sabin; was born in Georgia, Vermont, worked as the secretary of the State of Vermont, and represented Vermont's 3rd Congressional District.
Aaron S. Daggett fought in the Battle of Antietam during the American Civil War which had Abraham Lincoln as one of its commanders.
Aaron S Daggett fought in the Battle of Antietam, which was part of the American Civil War. Abraham Lincoln was a commander in the American Civil War.
Aaron S. Daggett fought in the Battle of Antietam which took place during the American Civil War, during which, Abraham Lincoln was a commander.
Aaron S Daggett fought at the Battle of Gettysburg during the American Civil War which had Jefferson Davis as one of its commanders.
Jefferson Davis was a commander in the American Civil War which included the Battle of Gettysburg in which Aaron S Daggett fought.
Aaron S Daggett fought at the Battle of Gettysburg which took place during the American Civil War. Jefferson Davis was a commander in that war.
